Title: Opalis Exchange Calendaring Integration Pack
Description: An integration pack for Opalis extending functionality to exchange calendaring features.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
An integration pack for Opalis extending functionality to exchange calendaring features.

This project allows for:

Creating Appointments
Getting Appointments
Canceling Appointments

I have created this project to support some work I am doing for an internal workflow. I will document it at a later point in time. Please feel free to use w/o documentation for the time being!
